title: Rads error
body:
I have tried many things to try and fix Rad.
- Going to network sharing/change adaptor setting/8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4
- Disabling UAC
- Running as admin (always do anyway)
- Running on compatibility mode
- Deleting certain files in the folder 
- Changing screen resolution? (seemed to work for some people)
- Disabling firewall and antivirus

I just dont know how im supposed to fix this and i would really like to play league...

replies.body: I just got this rads error bs riot ples I tried on my laptop and on my computer. it doesn't work. probably riot. ples fix this

I have this problem as well. Nothing has worked iv tried all the things you have tried. I'm fairly certain this is on riot's end, maybe something to do with internet provider connection to riot? no idea.
If you find a solution to this, tell me, please.

same problems, on a mac

This is probably a problem on Riot's end.
